name: Cherry School World
summary: This game is Cherry School World. The game takes place in the open fictional small world "Sakura Town". We designed the game scene to feel like you are in a hybrid world, and as a student, you can experience a simulated high school day-to-day life. This game is not an action and shooting game etc, but a simulator.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Scaring Everyone With a Gun In [Cherry School World]
